item.description:
Meet your Sitz friends and bring a guest to the new Aloft Hotel's "wxyz" bar just past the lobby of the new "Aloft Hotel".

This bar has become a popular Sitz meeting place.

The atmosphere is modern and hip!. Light appetizers will be served compliments of the Sitzundjibers Social Club. You can stay connected with complimentary wired and wireless internet services, if you wish.

Enjoy the conversation, the atmospphere and reconnect with some of the new faces you met at the New Faces cocktail party in November.

The Aloft Hotel is conveniently located at the intersection of Rt. 128(1-95) and Rt. 2A(marrett Road) take Exit 30B.

Diretions:

Coming from the north or south on Rt. 128 (1-95), take Exit 30B and head west briefly to the first stoplight about 0.2mile down. Turn right at this stoplight into the hotel driveway(across from Forbes Business Center)

From Boston: take Rte 2 west to Ret. 128 north to Rt. 2A west(Exit 30B)
item.name: Gather together 'tween the holidays
